title: Scientific Evidence Library
description: A concise library of clinical studies that support our regenerative joint and sexual health protocols.
longDescription: Every therapy we offer is anchored in published research—not trends. This library summarises the key prospective studies, randomized trials, and long-term follow-ups that inform our protocols for joint preservation and sexual wellness. Each article has been reviewed by our clinical team so patients understand the level of evidence behind their treatment choice.
